summary: In 1981 in Medjugorje (BA), a group of kids claim that Virgin Mary appeared to them on a hill. The local priest believes them and spreads the word. Religious tourism blossoms. The communist government is concerned and arrests the priest.
cast: Martin Sheen|Michael York|Morgan Fairchild|Paul Guilfoyle|George Coe|Ray Girardin|Frank Finlay|Tony Zazula|William Hootkins|Angelo Santiago|Mustafa Nadarevic|Zlatko Crnkovic|Mirko Boman|Slavko Brankov|Ivan Brkic|Petar Buntic|Daniela Colic-Prizmic|Antonia Cutic|Ivanka Dabetic|Terezija Dadic-Lepetic|Slobodan Dimitrijevic|Vanja Drach|William Greene|Goran Grgic|Ivica Joncic|Ljubo Kapor|Vjenceslav Kapural|Vasja Kovacic|Virginia Kraljevic|Danko Ljustina|Tonko Lonza|Marko Makovicic|Mary Maruna|Josip Masina|Stojan Matavulj|Jadranka Matkovic|Damir Mejovsek|Boris Miholjevic|Bozidar Oreskovic|Robert Plemic|Sinisa Popovic|Frank Raiter|Mile Rupcic|Alen Salinovic|Zarko Savic|Marija Sedlar|Aspen Sheridan|Vasek Simek|Bozidar Smiljanic|Sinisa Straga|Kresimir Sulentic|Boris Svrtan|Paul Tivers|Anica Tomic|Dara Vukic|Timothy Wheeler|Kresimir Zidaric|Ranko Zidaric|Zvonimir Zoricic
title: Gospa. El milagro de Medjugorje
